div.p: BILL THANKS FOR STAYING WITH US, I'M BILL O'REILLY
IN THE MILLER TIME SEGMENT TONIGHT.
LET'S GET TO THE SAGE OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA WHO
JOINS US NOW FROM SANTA BARBARA.
ALL RIGHT, A LOT OF INFORMATION FLOWING AROUND
ABOUT THESE TWO TERROR LOONS IN BOSTON.
HOW ARE YOU PROCESSING ALL OF IT?
>> FIRST OF O, BILLY, I WANT TO SAY IN REACTION TO
THE LAST SEGMENT, YOU'LL GET GOSNELL'S RIGHT TO
CAPRICIOUSLY ABORTED CHILDREN IN A QUESTIONABLE
MATTER WHEN YOU PRY IT FROM HIS COLD DEAD HAND.

HOMEMADE BOMBS WITH AN OBAMA PHONE.

ASK S. IT POSSIBLE WE IN AN EFFORT TO BE EVOLVED DON'T

HE IS EITHER STUPID, OR HE IS CREEPY, OR HE IS A
GENIUS LIKE HALL THOUSAND WHO IS THROWN A WIRE AND
DOESN'T KNOW QUITE WHAT HE IS DOING.
WE ARE SO POLARIZED IN THIS CULTURE RIGHT NOW.
I'M NOT EVEN SURE A GOOD OLD CLASH OF CIVILIZATIONS
IS ENOUGH TO BRING US TOGETHER ANYMORE.

DEATH. WE SHOULD DEBRAIN WASH THE

THE PICTURE OF THE 8-YEAR-OLD GAP TOOTHED

HE DID. WE SHOULD DO THE BRIDGES
SIZE THING LIKE THEY DO IN VENICE WHERE THE JAILER
TAKES THE OFF FOR A SECOND SAYS DO YOU WANT TO DO
YOURSELF OR TOM GOES TO VISIT IN PRISON AND SAYS DO
YOU WANT TO DO THE HONORABLE THING.
AND IF HE DOESN'T WE SHOULD TELL HIM WE ARE EVENTUALLY
GOING TO PUT HIM TO DEATH. THAT HERE IS THE CODA WE
ARE NOT GOING TO TELL HIM WHEN IT IS GOING TO HAPPEN.
BECAUSE HE DIDN'T TELL HIM. HE WILL SIT IN THE CELL

GROUND IN A WAR ON TERROR WE ARE GOING TO HAVE THE
BEST SEAT IN THE HOUSE TO WITNESS OUR OWN DEMISE.
WAKE UP AMERICA! >> Bill: NOW, YOU SAID A

YOU KNOW THAT ANYBODY NOW WHO UNDERSTANDS THE SYSTEM

YOU WANT IT? HE IS EITHER CREEPY, HE IS
